The 'MTR Light Rail', also known as the 'Light Rail Transit' ('LRT'), is a
light rail system in Hong Kong, serving the northwestern New Territories,
within and between Tuen Mun District and Yuen Long District. The system
operates over gauge track, using 750 V DC overhead power supply. It was once
one of four systems that made up the KCR network in Hong Kong. It has a daily
ridership of 430,000 http://www.gov.hk/en/about/abouthk/factsheets/docs/tr-
ansport.pdf people.
